newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-SCHALKE WIN UEFA CUP ON PENALTIES.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SCHALKE WIN UEFA CUP ON PENALTIES.

text.p: Schalke of Germany won the UEFA Cup on Wednesday when they beat Internazionale Milan of Italy 4-1 on penalties after ending the second leg of the final 1-1 on aggregate.

Inter - 1-Gianluca Pagliuca; 2-Giuseppe Bergomi (20-Jocelyn Angloma 71), 19-Massimo Paganin, 7-Salvatore Fresi, 3-Alessandro Pistone, 8-Paul Ince, 21-Ciriaco Sforza (14-Aron Winter 81), 4-Javier Zanetti (18-Nicola Berti 120), 6-Youri Djorkaeff, 9-Ivan Zamorano, 23-Maurizio Ganz.

Schalke - 1-Jens Lehmann, 10-Olaf Thon, 2-Thomas Linke, 25-Johan de Kock, 4-Yves Eigenrauch, 3-Radoslav Latal (16-Oliver Held 96), 20-Jiri Nemec, 6-Andreas Mueller (8-Ingo Anderbrugge 96), 119-Michael Bueskens, 24-Marc Wilmots, 11-Martin Max. 11-Martin Max.
